remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是用于基于数据库架构生成网页模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架生成基于 Web 的 UI，该 UI 使用户能够查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 此类使用 属性在动态数据网站中启用基架。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding in a Dynamic Data Web Site. 基架通过动态显示基于数据模型的页面，而不需要任何物理页面，从而增强了 ASP.NET 页框架。Scaffolding enhances ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. 基架提供以下功能：Scaffolding provides the following capabilities: - 创建数据驱动的 Web 应用程序所需的最少或无代码。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 快速开发。Quick development time. - 完全正常运行的页面，包括显示、插入、编辑、删除、排序和分页功能。Pages that are fully functional and include display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Built-in data validation that is based on the database schema. - 为每个外键或布尔字段创建的筛选器。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 通过将此特性应用于表示表的类中的相应数据字段对象，此类可用于启用或禁用数据模型中的数据列基架。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data columns in a data model by applying this attribute to the appropriate data field object in the class that represents the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将基架属性应用于 Products 分部类中的 ProductID 对象并将其设置为来 `true.` 隐藏 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 列（通过将基架属性应用于 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 对象并将其设置为）来公开 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中 Products 表的 ProductID 列 `false` 。The following code example exposes the ProductID column of the Products table in the AdventureWorksLT data base by applying the scaffold property to the ProductID object in the Products partial class and setting it to `true.` It hides the ThumbnailPhotoFileName column by applying the scaffold property to the ThumbnailPhotoFileName object and setting it to `false`. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(ProductMetadata))] public partial class Product { } public class ProductMetadata { [ScaffoldColumn(true)] public object ProductID; [ScaffoldColumn(false)] public object ThumbnailPhotoFileName; } ``` ```vb Public Partial Class Product End Class Public Class ProductMetadata Public ProductID As Object Public ThumbnailPhotoFileName As Object End Class ``` 若要编译代码示例，需要以下组件：To compile the example code, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅 GitHub 上的 [Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例：数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) 。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保为运行的 SQL Server 版本安装了正确版本的示例数据库。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 一个动态数据的网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 这使您可以为数据库创建数据上下文，并创建包含要自定义的数据字段的类以及要重写的方法。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它还创建使用之前所述页面的环境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [演练：使用基架创建新的动态数据网站](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 CRUD，你可以将设置为，以将 `scaffold` `true` 数据库中的所有数据列都公开 (创建、读取、更新和删除) 操作，方法 `scaffold` 是 `true` 在 global.asax 文件中将设置为，或者通过 `scaffold` `true` 在分部类中将设置为，将数据表中的单个数据列公开给 crud 操作。You can set `scaffold` to `true` for the entire data model to expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the Global.asax file or expose individual data columns in a data table to CRUD operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the partial class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性在数据模型中的单个数据列中启用基架。You can use this property to enable scaffolding in individual data columns in a data model. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` 在 global.asax 文件中，则整个数据模型将公开数据库中的所有数据列， (创建、读取、更新和删除) 操作。If you set this property to `true` in the global.asax file, the entire data model will expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations.
